caption.p: Maps of the climatic suitability of Bactrocera zonata under current (A) and four future climate change scenarios [i.e. four representative concentration pathways (RCPs)]–RCPs 2.6 (B), RCPs 4.5 (C), RCPs 6.0 (D) and RCPs 8.0 (E). The climatic suitability classes were: (i) not suitable (≤ 0.15), (ii) low suitability (0.16–0.30), (iii) medium suitability (0.31–0.60) and (iv) high suitability (≥ 0.61). “The figure was generated using the QGIS 3.10.2 software ( https://qgis.org)”.
